house_listing.house_description: Condo living on willoughby bay. Great condition! Walk to private beach. Two master suites with walk-in closets, cozy fireplace, sensor security lights, refrigerator, ele. Range, dishwasher & trash compactor. Upgraded heat pump 1995.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Boat Dock, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, CeilingFan(s), Contemporary Style, Gazebo, Pantry, Storage Space, Walk-InCloset(s)
